mean_cn: n. 云雀，玩笑，嬉耍；  v. 嬉耍，玩乐
mean_en: a small brown bird with a pleasant song; a thing that you do for fun or as a joke; (used after another noun) an activity that you think is a waste of time or that you do not take seriously
sentence: This morning I woke up to the sound of larks singing.
sentence_trans: 今早我一醒来就听到百灵鸟的吟唱。
